name: An exquisite dagger, pulsating with intense, dark power (1h)
data: It has colossal weapon class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity a bit.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'anatomy'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'triple backstab'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'double backstab'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'double thrust'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'thrust'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'triple thrust'.
It does poison damage unbelievably much.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'backstab'.
The dagger yearns to ember itself in an enemy's spine.
